data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Global warming caused by the emission of carbon dioxide is a globally concerned issue in current society. From an individual perspective, we can reduce our carbon footprint by changing the ways we are living in. For example, we can take public transportation more frequently rather than private cars when commuting. Meanwhile, we can save energy at home by turning off lights when we are leaving the room and reducing the usage of air conditioning and heating. Moreover, it is also a great idea to install solar panels at home. Instead of purchasing unnecessary cloth and food, only purchasing necessary products can reduce the energy used in disposing of them. In daily shopping, we can bring a recycled bag with us rather than using plastic bags. Individual behaviors may seem immaterial on their own, but if we all work together in the long run, we can see the differences we made. (151字)
data.referenceText: What are ways that individual people can reduce their carbon footprint?
data.referenceTranslate: 个人如何减少他们的碳足迹？
